name: Shmup 3D
description:
Partially inspired by cult classic Action RPG NieR, this is my attempt at bringing classical shmup and bullethell mechanics into the third dimension with a bit of modern flair.

The core mechanics are mostly there, and there's a single short level to play through. Progress is good, but there's still a lot more left to add- scoring, lives, bosses, win conditions, and so forth.

Full keyboard and controller support is present, so pick your poison and go to it. Enjoy!
